page.title: 08Trentham Park
page.content: Trentham Park is a huge park by Trentham Gardens open to the public. You can see some remains of old war shelters hidden beneath undergrowth. There is a reservoir which was used by soldiers in the war. There is a golf club within the park. The view from the top of the hill is beautiful. The trees blend together to make patterns of green. There are birds fluttering from tree to tree and there is squirrels and rabbits aswell. From the top of the hill you can see most of Stoke on Trent. If you are in the Trentham area ,Trentham Park is well worth a visit.
